arts.ttl: Serie A: Inter vs. Sassuolo – probable line-ups and where to watch on TV
arts.sum: Francesco Pio Esposito is favourite over Lautaro Martinez, while Josep Martinez is expected to start...

It was back in 2020/21, the year of the Nerazzurri`s Scudetto win with Conte at the helm, that Inter last conceded six goals in their first three Serie A matches. Fabio Grosso played for Inter in the 2006/07 season, making 35 appearances and scoring 3 goals, when the Nerazzurri won Serie A and the Italian Super Cup
